response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product holds immense value for us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it could significantly enhance your experience or meet an important need you have. Considering its worth and the effort put into it, I would like to extend an offer to sell this product to you for $12,000. We stand behind our product with a commitment to customer satisfaction, and we're confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you have any questions.", "product_price": 12000}
